title: Topic 001 Question 059
body: A company runs a retail website on multiple Amazon EC2 instances behind an Application Load Balancer (ALB). The company must secure traffic to the website over an HTTPS connection.
Which combination of actions should a SysOps administrator take to meet these requirements? (Choose two.)
options: Attach the certificate to each EC2 instance.
Attach the certificate to the ALB.
Create a private certificate in AWS Certificate Manager (ACM).
Create a public certificate in AWS Certificate Manager (ACM).
Export the certificate, and attach it to the website.
